viralPosts.text:
For as silly as I think it is, I think we should support people embracing accessibility technologies for the sake of AI agents by pointing them to the correct resources rather than pushing them away wholesale.

This is a chance to make a more accessible web, even if motivations are misguided.

#A11y

He didn‚Äôt hurt anyone‚Äîhe just loved trains.
Darius McCollum, an autistic man, spent decades in jail for following his passion instead of being offered support or a job. The system punished difference instead of understanding it.
#AutismAwareness #DisabilityJustice #Inclusion #Pink #Momsky

viralPosts.text: Upturn savagely unmasks Medicaid's algorithmic gatekeepers as cynical ploys to starve disabled folks of home care, dialing eligibility via vendor whispers to slash costs over needs‚Äîtime for rebel coders to hijack these sham equations. #DisabilityJustice
